Dear Parents/Guardians and Students,

The Berrien Springs Music Department will host a drive-thru drop-off event on Wednesday, May 20, 2020. This will give students and parents the opportunity to drop-off music items including uniforms, music, folders, and instruments. Parents and Guardians can also pick up fundraiser money and reimbursements from missed festivals during this event. We will not accept non-music items.

The drop off location will be at the Berrien Springs Middle School from 2pm to 5pm. Please use the front circle drive and remain in your car. Students are not allowed on campus at this time due to the stay home order from the Michigan government.

We appreciate your continued flexibility during this quarantine. We miss making music with your students and we are looking forward to being together again.

Musically Yours,

Carrie VanDenburgh, Choir Director
